demo.headline: Meet Your New Marketing Team
demo.subheadline_start: These aren't "bots." They're your digital staff.
demo.subheadline_bold1: They work 24/7/365. They speak multiple languages. They know your menu by heart. They never have a bad day.
demo.aiman_role: Fluent in Bahasa Malaysia and local culture. Understands Malaysian food preferences. Knows halal requirements inside out. Perfect for traditional restaurants, warungs, kopitiams.
demo.dev_role: Detail-oriented expert for specific cuisines. Navigates vegetarian, vegan, dietary restrictions. Explains spice levels and ingredients. Perfect for specialty restaurants.
demo.dev_prompt2: What do you recommend for kids?
demo.marco_role: Sophisticated voice for upscale establishments. Wine pairing suggestions. Handles special dietary requests elegantly. Ideal for Western restaurants, wine bars, fine dining.
demo.marco_prompt1: I need a quiet table for two tonight.
demo.nova_description: Your customers' first point of contact. Professional, warm, efficient. Answers phone calls instantly â€” even at 3am. Handles reservations and booking changes. Guides customers through menu and promotions.

nova_section.headline: Stop Hiring Tools.
nova_section.subheadline: Most "solutions" just give you more work. NorWeb is different. We don't give you software to learn. We give you a system that works while you sleep.
nova_section.feature1_desc: Not just pages. A lead-capture machine built to convert. Your website captures every visitor. Every visitor becomes a lead.
nova_section.feature2_desc: They speak. They listen. They book tables. 24/7. Nova answers calls at 2am. Your customers talk. Your website talks back.
nova_section.feature3_desc: Every visitor becomes a lead. Every lead gets followed up. Every follow-up becomes a booking. Your POS handles transactions. NorWeb handles attraction.

pain.headline: You Didn't Open a Restaurant to Become a Digital Marketer.
pain.body1: You wake up thinking about staff problems. You spend the day fighting fires. You close up at 11pm, exhausted.
pain.body2: Somewhere between the supplier crisis and the kitchen drama, you know you *should* be doing marketing.
pain.reality_header: The reality of your "marketing" right now:
pain.reality1: You posted on Facebook last month. Got 73 likes. Did anyone actually walk through your door? No idea.
pain.reality2: The phone rang six times during lunch rush yesterday. Your team was slammed serving customers. Those calls went to voicemail. Maybe reservations. Maybe a corporate event. You'll never know.
pain.reality3: Someone messaged on WhatsApp at 9pm asking about your menu. You saw it at midnight. They booked somewhere else.
pain.reality4: You paid RM3,000 for a website two years ago. When's the last time it actually brought you a customer?
pain.meanwhile: Meanwhile, the restaurant two streets down is always packed. Same food quality. Same prices.
pain.question: What are they doing that you're not?
pain.closing: You're stuck in the Operator Trap â€” working 14 hours a day *in* the business, with zero time to work *on* the business.

cost.headline: The Silent Leak in Your Cash Register
cost.scenario: It's 7:30pm. Dinner rush is slamming. The phone rings.
cost.nobody_answers: Nobody answers. Your team is too busy serving.
cost.not_just_noise: That missed call wasn't just noise.
cost.reservation_details: It was a reservation for 4 people
cost.one_call_per_day: Miss just ONE call per day?
cost.monthly_loss: That's RM6,000 walking out your door every month.
cost.leak1_what: Website visitors who leave without contacting you
cost.leak1_cost: 100% lost forever â€” no second chance
cost.leak2_what: Staff answering "What time do you close?" for the 50th time today
cost.leak2_cost: Slower service, frustrated customers, wasted wages
cost.leak3_cost: Every customer treated like a stranger, no repeat strategy
cost.leak4_cost: Money spent with zero proof, same mistakes repeated
cost.biggest_cost_desc: You're working harder every month â€” but not growing.
cost.competitors: Your competitors aren't working harder than you. They just have help.

cta.headline: Tomorrow Morning Could Look Different
cta.body: You can wake up tomorrow and: Still have missed calls from last night. Still have unanswered WhatsApp messages. Still have no idea which marketing works. Still be running yourself into the ground. Or. You can start the 7-day countdown to having an AI marketing department that: Answered every call. Captured every lead. Nurtured every interested customer. Turned interest into bookings. While you slept.
